Description: Small, light green faience amulet of an Isis-knot. A pair of small cylindrical holes appear, joined on, at either end for attaching it to some sort of larger jewellery piece. The rear side of the amulet is flat and smooth.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D12.1, lowest level
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 166)
